Sequence Information.Peptide Name: BTD-8 (BTD 8, Baboon theta-defensin-8; natural AMPs; primates, mammals, animals; 3S=S, XXC; UCBB1ab; Cys-rich; Arg-rich)

Literature.Author: Basso V, Garcia A, Tran DQ, Schaal JB, Tran P, Ngole D, Aqeel Y, Tongaokai P, Quellette AJ, Selsted ME 2018.
Literature.Title: Fungicidal Potency and Mechanisms of theta-Defensins Against Multidrug-Resistant Candida Species

Sequence Information.Comments: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals this sequence is most similar (94.4%) toBTD-2.  (only one residue differs from BTD-2. V3 vs. F3).Activity: Active against drug resistant C. albicans clinical isolates (MIC 3.1-12.5 ug/ml). Seq8/2022
